description:
Grimmjow is the only survivor of the Arrancars` intense battle with the Soul Reapers. He returns with Tosen to Sosuke Aizen`s palace, Las Noches in Hueco Mundo. While Aizen shows understanding towards Grimmjow`s disobedience, Tosen decides that he should still be punished for his actions. Meanwhile, having lost terribly to Grimmjow, Ichigo visits the Visored Shinji Hirako.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vizard! The Power of the Awakened
ヴァイザード! 目覚めし者たちの力
